## Alert class

A popup form to alert the user that some event has occured

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Alert 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fatal(msg, title)](./forms42core.alert.fatal.md) | <code>static</code> | Alert the user that a fatal event has occured |
|  [message(msg, title)](./forms42core.alert.message.md) | <code>static</code> | Alert the user an event has occured |
|  [warning(msg, title)](./forms42core.alert.warning.md) | <code>static</code> | Alert the user that an event causing an warning has occured |
